title: Jordan Highlights

dailyPlan.title: Amman Airport – Amman
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist at Amman Airport, transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman City Tour – Jerash – Amman
dailyPlan.body: Visit Amman (markets, history) and Jerash, the Greco-Roman city known as the 'Pompeii of the East.' Dinner & overnight in Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Amman – Madaba – Mount Nebo – Shobak – Petra
dailyPlan.body: Visit St. George's Church in Madaba (mosaic map), Mount Nebo (panoramic views), Shobak Castle. Continue to Petra. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Visit
dailyPlan.body: Full day at Petra, including Siq and Treasury. Dinner & overnight in Petra.

dailyPlan.title: Petra – Wadi Rum (Jeep 4x4, 2 hrs) – Dead Sea
dailyPlan.body: Drive to Wadi Rum desert, jeep excursion, then transfer to Dead Sea (lowest point on earth). Free time. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea – Amman Airport
dailyPlan.body: Breakfast. Transfer to Amman Airport.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Transport in AC private minivan with English driver
2 hrs jeep tour in Wadi Rum

dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist, transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Visit

dailyPlan.title: Petra – Wadi Rum (Jeep 4x4, 2 hrs)
dailyPlan.body: Drive to Wadi Rum for jeep desert experience. Dinner & overnight in camp.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum – Dead Sea
dailyPlan.body: Transfer to Dead Sea, free time to float and relax. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea – Amman Airport
dailyPlan.body: Breakfast. Transfer to Amman Airport.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Transport in AC private minivan with English driver
2 hrs jeep tour in Wadi Rum

title: Grand Jordan

dailyPlan.title: Amman Airport – Amman
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist, transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman City Tour – Jerash – Amman
dailyPlan.body: Tour Amman & Jerash (Hadrian's Gate, Cardo, Theater). Dinner & overnight in Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Amman – Madaba – Mount Nebo – Shobak – Petra
dailyPlan.body: Visit Madaba (mosaic map), Mount Nebo (Moses site), Shobak Castle. Dinner & overnight in Petra.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Visit
dailyPlan.body: Full day exploring Petra (Siq, Treasury, tombs). Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Petra – Wadi Rum (Jeep 4x4, 2 hrs)
dailyPlan.body: Drive to Wadi Rum desert for jeep excursion. Dinner & overnight in Bedouin camp.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum – Amman
dailyPlan.body: Return to Amman. Free day. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman – Dead Sea
dailyPlan.body: Transfer to Dead Sea, enjoy floating. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea – Amman Airport
dailyPlan.body: Breakfast. Transfer to Amman Airport.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Transport in AC private minivan with English driver
2 hrs jeep tour in Wadi Rum

title: Jordan Highlights
highlights: Best for first-timers with limited time

dailyPlan.title: Amman Arrival
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist at Queen Alia International Airport (QAIA). Transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight in Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Amman City Tour & Jerash
dailyPlan.body: Citadel, Roman Theater, downtown souks & Rainbow Street photo stop. Drive to Jerash: Hadrian's Arch, Oval Plaza, Cardo, theaters, Artemis Temple. Back to Amman. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Madaba & Mount Nebo → Petra
dailyPlan.body: St. George's Church (mosaic map), Mount Nebo panorama. Continue via Desert/King's Highway photo stops. Check in at Petra. Optional Petra by Night (on operating days, supplement). Dinner & overnight in Petra.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Full Visit → Dead Sea
dailyPlan.body: Siq, Treasury, Street of Facades, Theater, Royal Tombs. (Optional Monastery/High Place of Sacrifice for fit guests). Afternoon transfer to Dead Sea. Floating time, resort facilities. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea → Airport
dailyPlan.body: Free morning; transfer to QAIA.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Private A/C transport with English-speaking driver
Licensed local guides: Amman & Jerash (Day 2) + Petra (Day 4)
addons: Add Wadi Rum half-day (with 2-hr 4×4) by extending one night (turn into 6D/5N)

title: Jordan In-Depth

dailyPlan.title: Amman Arrival
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist at airport. Transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman & Jerash
dailyPlan.body: Full tour of Amman and Jerash. Dinner & overnight Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Ajloun & Umm Qais
dailyPlan.body: Ajloun Castle; continue to Umm Qais (Decapolis vistas). Back to Amman. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Madaba, Mount Nebo, Kerak → Petra
dailyPlan.body: Mosaic map, Nebo panorama, Kerak Crusader Castle photo stop. Dinner & overnight Petra.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Full Visit
dailyPlan.body: Treasury, Royal Tombs, optional Monastery. Dinner & overnight Petra.

dailyPlan.title: Little Petra → Wadi Rum
dailyPlan.body: Siq al-Barid (Little Petra). Wadi Rum 4×4 (2 hrs): dunes, canyons, rock bridges. Bedouin dinner under stars. Overnight in desert camp.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum → Aqaba
dailyPlan.body: Morning at leisure; transfer to Aqaba. Free beach time / optional snorkeling/boat. Overnight Aqaba.

dailyPlan.title: Aqaba → Dead Sea
dailyPlan.body: Transfer along Wadi Araba. Floating at Dead Sea. Dinner & overnight Dead Sea.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea → Airport
dailyPlan.body: Transfer to QAIA.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Private A/C transport with English-speaking driver
Licensed local guides at major sites

title: Jordan & Egypt Express

dailyPlan.title: Arrive Amman
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist at airport. Transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman & Jerash
dailyPlan.body: Full tour of Amman and Jerash. Dinner & overnight Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Madaba & Mount Nebo → Petra
dailyPlan.body: Visit Madaba (mosaic map), Mount Nebo. Continue to Petra. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Full Visit
dailyPlan.body: Full day exploring Petra. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum 4x4 → Dead Sea → Amman
dailyPlan.body: Wadi Rum 4×4 (2 hrs), transfer to Dead Sea for floating, then to Amman. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Fly Amman → Cairo
dailyPlan.body: Afternoon Giza Pyramids & Sphinx photo tour. Cairo overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Egyptian Museum & Old Cairo
dailyPlan.body: Egyptian Museum & Old Cairo (Coptic & Khan el-Khalili). Overnight Cairo.

dailyPlan.title: Flight Cairo → Luxor
dailyPlan.body: Karnak & Luxor Temples. Overnight Luxor.

dailyPlan.title: Luxor West Bank
dailyPlan.body: Valley of the Kings (3 tombs), Hatshepsut Temple, Colossi of Memnon. Overnight Luxor.

dailyPlan.title: Departure
dailyPlan.body: Departure from Luxor or return to Cairo (per flight plan).

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Private A/C transport with English-speaking driver
Licensed local guides at major sites

title: Classic Jordan & Nile Cruise

dailyPlan.title: Arrive Amman
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist. Transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Amman & Jerash
dailyPlan.body: Full tour. Dinner & overnight Amman.

dailyPlan.title: Petra via Madaba & Nebo
dailyPlan.body: Visit Madaba & Mount Nebo. Continue to Petra. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Petra Full Visit
dailyPlan.body: Full day in Petra. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum 4x4 → Aqaba
dailyPlan.body: Wadi Rum 4×4 tour, transfer to Aqaba. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.title: Dead Sea → Amman Airport → Cairo
dailyPlan.body: Transfer to Dead Sea for floating, then evening flight to Cairo. Overnight Cairo.

dailyPlan.title: Cairo City Tour
dailyPlan.body: Museum, Old Cairo, Khan el-Khalili. Overnight Cairo.

dailyPlan.title: Fly Cairo → Aswan
dailyPlan.body: Embark cruise. Philae Temple & High Dam. Overnight on cruise.

dailyPlan.title: Nile Cruise
dailyPlan.body: Kom Ombo & Edfu (cruise calls). Overnight on cruise.

dailyPlan.title: Luxor East Bank
dailyPlan.body: Karnak & Luxor Temples. Overnight on cruise.

dailyPlan.title: Luxor West Bank
dailyPlan.body: Valley of the Kings (3 tombs), Hatshepsut, Colossi. Disembark. Overnight Luxor hotel.

dailyPlan.title: Departure
dailyPlan.body: Departure from Luxor or fly back to Cairo.

inclusions: Meet & assist on arrival and departure
Private A/C transport with English-speaking driver
Licensed local guides at major sites

eg: Sonesta St. George Nile Cruise (5★ Deluxe)

dailyPlan.body: Drive to Medina. Viewpoints & Islamic Museum (outer areas for non-Muslims). Overnight Medina.

dailyPlan.title: Medina → AlUla
dailyPlan.body: Fly to AlUla. Hegra, Dadan, Jabal Ikmah. Overnight AlUla.

dailyPlan.title: AlUla → Riyadh
dailyPlan.body: Maraya photo stop. Fly to Riyadh. Overnight Riyadh.

dailyPlan.title: Riyadh City Tour
dailyPlan.body: National Museum, Diriyah (if open), Boulevard by night. Overnight Riyadh.

dailyPlan.body: Transfer to airport for departure.

title: Arabia Grand Journey – Jordan & KSA

dailyPlan.title: Arrive Amman
dailyPlan.body: Meet & assist. Transfer to hotel. Dinner & overnight.

dailyPlan.body: Full tour. Dinner & overnight Amman.

dailyPlan.body: Mosaic map, Mount Nebo, Kerak Castle. Dinner & overnight Petra.

dailyPlan.body: Wadi Rum 4×4, stargazing with Bedouin. Overnight camp.

dailyPlan.title: Wadi Rum → Aqaba
dailyPlan.body: Transfer to Aqaba. Beach time. Overnight Aqaba.

dailyPlan.title: Aqaba → Dead Sea → Amman
dailyPlan.body: Dead Sea floating, Amman street-food walk. Overnight Amman.

dailyPlan.body: Taif rose farms (seasonal Mar-Apr). Continue to Medina. Overnight Medina.

dailyPlan.body: Fly to AlUla. Hegra sunrise, Dadan, Jabal Ikmah. Overnight AlUla.
